titles.title: Na Hoa Pili O Kaloko-Honokohau Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act of 2007
Na Hoa Pili O Kaloko-Honokohau Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act of 2007
A bill to amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to reauthorize the Na Hoa Pili O Kaloko-Honokohau Advisory Commission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 110-158.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman without amendment. With written report No. 110-161.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 359.

bill.summary: 9/17/2007--Reported to Senate without amendment. Noa Hoa Pili O Kaloko-Honokohau Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act of 2007 - Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to reauthorize the Noa Hoa Pili O Kaloko-Honokohau Advisory Commission until December 31, 2017.
